concat.scalar: We periodically have sales, holiday discounts and special deals for special occasions! Choose the occasion to see our offers!
I didn't catch that. Select a valid option:
Check out our [Christmas Cheer!](https://hive0.wordbox.intela.io/fechris89/specialdeals) special discount 🎁! All flowers are 40% off from December 1st till January 5th!

Need special flowers to celebrate one of the happiest days of your life 👰🤵but you don't want to pay the full CAD 125? Our [Happy Weds!](https://hive0.wordbox.intela.io/fechris89/specialdeals) deal got you covered with the bouquets being 50% off from November to March!

Unfortunately, our [Flowers for Amazing Moms!](https://hive0.wordbox.intela.io/fechris89/specialdeals) discount isn't available yet 🙁. You'll have to wait till next Mother's Day in March. In the meantime, you can look at our [other discounts](https://hive0.wordbox.intela.io/fechris89/specialdeals)!

Our [Lovely Couples!](https://hive0.wordbox.intela.io/fechris89/specialdeals) special discount doesn't open till Valentine's Day, sorry 🙁. But, you can check out our other [special discounts](https://hive0.wordbox.intela.io/fechris89/specialdeals)!

Looking to purchase our unique birthday 🎈flowers for a lower price? See our [It's Your Birthday!](https://hive0.wordbox.intela.io/fechris89/specialdeals) special discount with the bouquets being 30% off! We just opened the deal on January 1st and is available for just two weeks in each month.
For other occasions, we have regular and periodic sales and deals; check them out [here](https://hive0.wordbox.intela.io/fechris89/specialdeals)!
